block_text.room_desc:
Offering a fusion of modern and Vietnamese d√©cor, these rooms offer tropical garden or island landscape views. Each room is equipped with an LCD TV, safety deposit box, mini-bar and complimentary tea and coffee making facilities. The rooms come with a writing desk and features separate internet line/ethernet, on top of the free WiFi. Some rooms feature balconies. Private bathroom is fitted with a separate shower and bathtub.

Room rate is based on 2 adults. Room can accommodate up to 3 adults and 1 one child under 4 years. The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don‚Äôt book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information:
Room rates on 31 December include a gala dinner. Extra guests will be charged separately. === Room rate is based on 2 adults only. 

Kindly present children's birth certificate(s) upon check-in. Maximum 1 child under 4 years stays free of charge when using existing beds. Older children will be charged separately and guests are to pay the surcharge at the property. If children's birth certificates are not provided, their age will be converted based on their height. Please contact the property directly for further information. 

The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.

Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Please inform Vinpearl Resort Nha Trang of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation. Payment before arrival by bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 7 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 7 days before arrival.

All children are welcome. 4 children under 4 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
4 children from 4 to 12 year are charged  VND 1340000 per night when using existing beds.
One child from 4 to 12 years is charged VND 1590000  per night in an extra bed.
One older child or adult is charged VND 2910000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 10.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Any type of extra bed is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in public areas and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  at a location nearby (reservation is not needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation in the 7 days before arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
